ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_women] Marriage question......
ygData.msgSnippet: Brangvyne, One of my characters, her husband quit playing EQ.  So, she s not married anymore I suppose ... I know that you can /petition and ask to have your
ygData.messageBody:
Brangvyne,

One of my characters, her husband quit playing EQ.  So, she's not married anymore I suppose ... I know that you can /petition and ask to have your surname changed back but, Amarantha still strolls around with his surname.  So, basically it's all up to the players.

I hope that information helps.

Sinrianna Soulsteal ~ Dark Elf Warrior of the 36th circle ~ Vazaelle server

 Brangvyne Accampo <brangvyne7@...> wrote:

Salutation All!

Say is it possible to get unmarried in EQ?

I mean suppose your "spouse" quits playing and you
find interest elsewhere or somehting.

Just curious.

Hugs!
:o)
Brangvyne Nic Ne Sidhe
10th lvl Ranger
